Hi!

I'm currently an Analyst at Universal McCann on the Business Analytics Engine. I'm also studying at Queens College part-time, pursuing a BA in Computer Science. In 2019, I graduated from Baruch College with a double major in Mathematics and Economics.
My interests lie in machine learning and artificial intelligence.
In our day and age, we have a tremendous amount of data and not enough people who can understand it. It's no longer enough to be a good programmer, a math whiz, or a statistician. It is crucial to be able to combine all of these things to extract, formulate, and derive insights. My goal is to tell a captivating story with the work I do and hopefully inspire others to tell their own.

Resume

  • Work Experience

  • Data Analytics Resident

    Orion Worldwide, IPG Media Brands | Summer 2019

    Interning at Orion was a blast. I spent quite a bit of time building macros that generated reports and conducted data validation processes for various teams. My main project involved a media pitch to Spotify. For this project, I built several web scraping tools in Python using BeautifulSoup and Selenium. I also conducted a sentiment analysis on tweets using Tensorflow and NLTK.

  • Sales & Trading Intern

    Lampert Capital Markets | October 2016 - August 2017

    At Lampert, I was exposed to a variety of responsibilities. I worked closely with the traders in developing and debugging my own trading algorithms. These were predominantly written in Python and the data was managed using MySQL. My experience with VBA came from developing macros and plugins for the bankers to use in their models

  • Desktop Engineer

    The Brandman Agency | April 2015 - August 2016

    At The Brandman Agency, I provided Level 2 technical support within the office. I mainly handled desktop issues which directly affected employees and performed upgrades on about 25 desktops.
